description: Rear drive class E sedan (body W213). Restyling of the fifth generation of the model. The premiere show of the model took place online on March 3, 2020.
overview: The W213 Mercedes-Benz E-Class is the fifth-generation of the Mercedes-Benz E-Class. Sold from 2016 (as a 2017 model), it is the successor to the W212/S212 E-Class models. Unlike the previous generation, this generation coupe/convertible share the same platform as the sedan/wagon. The high-performance Mercedes-AMG E 63 and E 63 S versions of the W213 has been available as well from 2016 (as a 2017 model), and these are the only versions with V8 engines.

specifications.name: Engine capacity(l):
specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
